reviews.review: Excellent game, the best shooting and movement mechanics out there. Feels bad that the trust factor update ruined the game for me, as i instantly get matched against cheaters whenever i come back to the game. One day I'll play enough to get a better rating, but the experience isn't helping.
4 RUSKIS TY STARTUJESZ SOLO = ZJEBANY DZIEN NIE POZDRAWIAM
